products.title: Bronze Member
products.description: Bronze members receive 2 bottles a month. Members choose between red, white, or both varietals. Valued over $50!

products.title: Silver Member
products.description: Silver members receive 6 bottles a month (half of one case). Members choose between red, white, or both varietals. Valued over $125!

products.title: Gold Member
products.description: Gold members receive 12 bottles a month (one full case). Members choose between red, white, or both varietals. Valued over $200!
